TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: Exciting news friends! I have made significant progress towards deciphering the language of our new neighbors!
NESIA: If you do not mind my asking, what particulars of their language have you decrypted?

SENNETTI: Mostly common words, such as â€œandâ€? and â€œthe.â€? Notably, however, I have also deciphered certain names! Specifically, the species refer to themselves as the Dree, and the Dree I have been working with is known as Ditylum!
AZOLLA: Good work Sennetti! At this rate, weâ€™ll be able to share discoveries with the Dree before too long.
OKALIS: This is wonderful news Sennetti! Does this mean there will be fewer obstacles in the way of communication?
SENNETTI: Somewhat, but I am still far from completing my translation.
OKALIS: Would this happen to be the same Dree that we first met?
SENNETTI: That is correct! It seems he is quite eager to help facilitate communications between our two species.
